name: Crazy Bikers 2 Free
description:
Crazy Bikers 2 - The epic race around the world!

One of the best action racing games with over 6 MILLION downloads! Thank you!

Crazy Bikers 2 is a unique stunt bike racing game, full of action. You have to race faster than anyone else while doing stunts. If you like stunt bike racing games or dirt bike racing games then Crazy Bikers 2 is for you. You will ride on sand, dirt or ice from Antartica to the hot deserts of Africa. Backflips, wheelies, jumps over huge cliffs, it's all in there!

Crazy Bikers 2 features some of the most beautiful, colourful and detailed graphics you have seen in this type of game on an iPhone or iPad. Even so, what sets Crazy Bikers 2 apart is the gameplay - a work of art, literally. With a new physics engine featuring full-suspension in all bicycles and terrains hand built curve by curve specifically to give you the ultimate, smoothest, riding experience. You can be sure you'll experience absolute smoothness and control over the bike. Oh, by the way, there's more than just bicycles!

Some major features:

- Universal game, all devices supported;
- No up scaled graphics. High quality, high resolution art;
- High performance physics engine, completely smooth riding;
- Full suspension on all bicycles;
- Eight awesome worlds with six tracks each;
- 12 cool and funny crazy riders and their extreme bikes;
- Night mode for riding at night;
- Weather effects such as snow and rain;
- Turbos at the push of a button when you need more speed;
- Original, high quality soundtrack;
- Simple but super fun game mechanics;
- Control modes: Tilt / Classic;

Have fun around the world with your favorite Crazy Bikers!
